Package index

All functions

add_text()
Add text to a tidyprompt
add_tools()
Enable R function calling for prompt evaluation by a LLM
answer_as_boolean()
Make LLM answer as a boolean (TRUE or FALSE)
answer_as_code()
Instruct LLM to answer a prompt with R code
answer_as_integer()
Make LLM answer as an integer (between min and max)
answer_as_list()
Make LLM answer as a list of items
answer_as_named_list()
Extract named list from LLM response with optional item instructions and validations
answer_as_regex()
Make LLM answer match a specific regex
answer_by_chain_of_thought()
Set chain of thought mode for a prompt
answer_by_react()
Set ReAct mode for a prompt
chat_history()
Create or validate chat_history object
construct_prompt_text()
Construct prompt text from a tidyprompt object
df_to_string()
Convert a dataframe to a string representation
extract_doc_section()
Extract a specific section from a function's docstring-like documentation block
extract_from_return_list()
Function to extract a specific element from a list
extract_r_code_from_string()
Helper function to extract R code from a string
extract_tool_function_docs_for_llm()
Extract docstring-documentation from a function
get_base_prompt()
Get base prompt from tidyprompt
get_extractions_and_validations()
Get extractions and validations from a tidyprompt
get_prompt_wraps()
Get prompt wraps from tidyprompt
get_prompt_wraps_ordered()
Extract only prompt wraps and reorder them in order of operations
is_tidyprompt()
Check if object is a valid tidyprompt
llm_break()
Create an llm_break object
llm_feedback()
Create an llm_feedback object

llm_provider() R6 Class
llm_provider_fake()
Create a fake llm_provider() (for development and testing purposes)

Create a new Google Gemini llm_provider() instance

Create a new OpenRouter llm_provider() instance

Create a new XAI (Grok) llm_provider() instance
make_llm_provider_request()
Make a request to an LLM provider
print(<tidyprompt>)
Print method for tidyprompt() objects
prompt_wrap()
Wrap a prompt or tidyprompt with additional functionality
prompt_wrap(<default>)
Default method for prompt_wrap()
prompt_wrap(<tidyprompt>)
prompt_wrap() method for when a tidyprompt() object is supplied
prompt_wrap_internal()
Internal function to append a prompt_wrap() to a tidyprompt() object
quit_if()
Make evaluation of a prompt stop if LLM gives a specific response
send_prompt()
Send a prompt or tidyprompt() to a LLM provider

Set system prompt

Methods to create, construct, and empower prompt objects
tidyprompt(<character>)
Method to create a tidyprompt object from a character string

Default method to create a tidyprompt object
tidyprompt(<tidyprompt>)
